section.p: The undead pirate reaches for you, but it is too slow. Then it speaks, its voice seeming to sound inside your head.

‘Damn you, and your kind, thieving sea centaur! I curse you forever - may you never swim again in the seas you love. You will walk for the rest of your life as a human, doomed to wander the surface world, unable to find the peace of coral caves!’

Quickly, you swim away, unable to believe your luck! What a convenient curse. You find yourself already changing back to a human, and you make it to your ship, coughing and spluttering. Your crew haul you aboard. The gems are worth - add that much to your money. You sail on, lucky to be still human. .
